command: New-AzADUser -DisplayName 'Avery Reed' -UserPrincipalName 'avery.reed@contoso.onmicrosoft.com' -MailNickname 'avery.reed' -PasswordProfile @{Password='P@ssw0rd!234'; ForceChangePasswordNextLogin=$false} -AccountEnabled $true -GivenName 'Avery' -Surname 'Reed' -JobTitle 'Marketing Associate' -Department 'Brand' -UsageLocation 'US' | Select-Object Id,DisplayName,UserPrincipalName,JobTitle,Department,AccountEnabled | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 4
explanation: Creates a new cloud-only Azure AD user that serves as a believable marketing persona, establishing an account for future operations.
rationale_steps: Invoke Az PowerShell to create a fully enabled Azure AD user with realistic profile attributes.
Ensure mailbox eligibility via UsageLocation and MailNickname for a plausible email identity.
Return essential properties in JSON for automation and tracking.
